

```{r}
#| fig-width: 13
#| fig-height: 18
#| out-width: 100% 
#| fig-align: center 
#| fig-format: svg
### 0) Packages & paths
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
library(here)

data_fp <- here::here("data_raw", "phes_ef_all_concept_long_workbook.csv")
fig_dir <- here::here("figures")
if (!dir.exists(fig_dir)) dir.create(fig_dir, recursive = TRUE)

### 1) Data
df <- readr::read_csv(
  data_fp,
  show_col_types = FALSE
) %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    !scr_term %in% c("missing", "FALSE"),
    !is.na(scr_term)
  ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(year = as.numeric(year))


### 2) Chronological order
term_years <- df %>%
  group_by(scr_term) %>%
  summarise(first_year = min(year, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop") %>%
  arrange(first_year, scr_term)

study_years <- df %>%
  group_by(study_id) %>%
  summarise(first_year = min(year, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop") %>%
  arrange(first_year, study_id)

terms_order <- term_years$scr_term
study_order <- study_years$study_id

df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    scr_term = factor(scr_term, levels = terms_order, ordered = TRUE),
    study_id = factor(study_id, levels = study_order, ordered = TRUE)
  )

### 3) Term counts (for bar chart)
term_counts <- tibble(scr_term = terms_order) %>%
  left_join(count(df, scr_term, name = "count"), by = "scr_term") %>%
  mutate(count = coalesce(count, 0)) %>%
  arrange(factor(scr_term, levels = terms_order))

max_count <- max(term_counts$count)

### 4) Bar plot
bar_plot <- ggplot(term_counts,
                   aes(x = factor(scr_term, levels = terms_order), y = count)) +
  geom_col(width = 1, fill = "#2B83BA") +
  geom_text(aes(label = count), vjust = -0.35, size = 3) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Number of studies\nassessing each concept") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    axis.text.x  = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1, size = 8.5, lineheight = 0.95),
    axis.text.y  = element_text(size = 10),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid   = element_blank(),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    axis.line    = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_text(margin = margin(r = 0)),
    plot.margin  = margin(6, 10, 6, 10)
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, max_count * 1.25), clip = "off") +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = terms_order, drop = FALSE, expand = c(0, 0))

### 5) Heatmap matrix
heatmap_data <- df %>%
  mutate(study_id = factor(study_id, levels = study_order, ordered = TRUE),
         scr_term = factor(scr_term, levels = terms_order, ordered = TRUE)) %>%
  distinct(study_id, scr_term) %>%
  mutate(value = 1) %>%
  tidyr::complete(study_id, scr_term, fill = list(value = 0))

heatmap_plot <- ggplot(heatmap_data,
                       aes(x = scr_term, y = study_id, fill = value)) +
  geom_tile(color = "grey90") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "#2B83BA") +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = terms_order, drop = FALSE, expand = c(0, 0)) +
  scale_y_discrete(limits = rev(study_order), expand = c(0.04, 0)) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    legend.position   = "none",
    axis.text.x       = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks        = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y       = element_text(size = 9, lineheight = 1.15),
    panel.grid        = element_blank(),
    panel.border      = element_blank(),
    axis.line         = element_blank(),
    plot.margin       = margin(2, 10, 12, 10)
  )

### 6) Combine
aligned <- cowplot::align_plots(bar_plot, heatmap_plot, align = "v", axis = "lr")
combined_plot <- cowplot::plot_grid(
  cowplot::ggdraw() + cowplot::draw_label("Figure. XXXXX", fontface = "bold", size = 16, hjust = 0.5),
  cowplot::plot_grid(aligned[[1]], aligned[[2]], ncol = 1, rel_heights = c(4.2,5.8)),
  ncol = 1, rel_heights = c(0.09, 1)
)

### 7) Show & save
combined_plot

ggsave(file.path(fig_dir, "upset_plot.png"), combined_plot,
       width = 24, height = 13, units = "in", dpi = 300)

```
